Other Information.Additional Info: The UiO-66-(OH)2 membrane selectively blocks lithium polysulfides through size sieving and electrostatic repulsion.
The UiO-66-(OH)2 membrane facilitates a rapid and uniform diffusion of solvated Li+ ions.

Sieving Mechanism: Selective blocking of lithium polysulfides while allowing solvated Li+ to pass through.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, GCD profiles, CV curves, EIS analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Capacity retention: 89.5% over 100 cycles; Coulombic efficiency: nearly 100%; D Li+: higher than PP separator

Other Information.Additional Info: The UiO-66-(OH)2 membrane also exhibits flexibility and structural stability during battery cycling.
